context: The word 'väljapääsu' is the partitive form of 'väljapääs', which means 'exit' or 'way out'. It refers to a passage or opening through which one can leave a place, especially when referring to finding an exit from a difficult situation, building, or confined space. The word combines 'välja' (out) and 'pääs' (passage/entry), literally meaning 'out-passage'.
